controls.name: Asset Management - Physical Devices
controls.description: Physical devices and systems within the organization are inventoried
controls.remediation: Deploy automated asset discovery tools and maintain CMDB

controls.name: Asset Management - Software Platforms
controls.description: Software platforms and applications within the organization are inventoried

controls.name: Organizational Communication Flows
controls.description: Organizational communication and data flows are mapped
controls.remediation: Deploy network mapping and data flow analysis tools

controls.name: Asset Vulnerabilities
controls.description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented
controls.remediation: Weekly vulnerability scans and risk-based patching

controls.name: Threat Intelligence
controls.description: Threat and vulnerability information is received from information sharing forums
controls.remediation: Subscribe to industry threat intelligence feeds

controls.name: Access Control - Identity Management
controls.description: Identities and credentials are issued, managed, verified, revoked, and audited
controls.remediation: Implement IAM with MFA and regular access reviews

controls.name: Access Permissions
controls.description: Access permissions and authorizations are managed
controls.remediation: Quarterly access recertification and least privilege enforcement

controls.name: Data at Rest Protection
controls.description: Data-at-rest is protected
controls.remediation: Deploy encryption for databases and file systems

controls.name: Data in Transit Protection
controls.description: Data-in-transit is protected
controls.remediation: Enforce TLS 1.2+ and monitor for unencrypted protocols

controls.name: Audit Logs
controls.description: Audit/log records are determined, documented, implemented, and reviewed

controls.name: Network Baseline
controls.description: A baseline of network operations is established
controls.remediation: Establish behavioral baselines using ML-driven analytics

controls.name: Anomaly Detection
controls.description: Detected events are analyzed to understand attack targets and methods

controls.name: Network Monitoring
controls.description: The network is monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events

controls.name: Malicious Code Detection
controls.description: Malicious code is detected

controls.name: Event Detection
controls.description: Event detection information is communicated

controls.name: Response Plan
controls.description: Response plan is executed during or after an incident
controls.remediation: Documented IR playbooks with quarterly testing

controls.name: Incident Reporting
controls.description: Incidents are reported consistent with established criteria
controls.remediation: Automated incident reporting and notification workflows

controls.name: Incident Notification
controls.description: Notifications from detection systems are investigated

controls.name: Incident Mitigation
controls.description: Incidents are mitigated

controls.name: Recovery Plan
controls.description: Recovery plan is executed during or after a cybersecurity incident
controls.remediation: Develop and test disaster recovery procedures

controls.name: Recovery Communications
controls.description: Recovery activities are communicated to internal and external stakeholders

controls.name: Recovery Plan Improvement
controls.description: Recovery plans incorporate lessons learned

domains.name: Human Resource Security
domains.remediation: Background checks and security awareness training

domains.name: Asset Management
domains.description: Identification and protection of organizational assets

domains.name: Access Control
domains.description: Management of access to systems and data

domains.name: System Acquisition, Development and Maintenance
domains.remediation: Secure coding practices and code review

domains.name: Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity
domains.remediation: Business continuity and disaster recovery plans

criteria.name: Control Environment
criteria.description: Organization demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values
criteria.remediation: Documented code of conduct and ethics training

criteria.name: Communication and Information
criteria.description: Information necessary to support the functioning of internal control

criteria.name: Change Management
criteria.description: System changes are authorized and tested

criteria.name: Risk Mitigation
criteria.description: Risk mitigation activities are identified and deployed

controls.name: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
controls.description: Actively manage all enterprise assets
controls.remediation: Implement inventory and control of enterprise assets

controls.name: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
controls.description: Actively manage all software
controls.remediation: Implement inventory and control of software assets

controls.name: Data Protection
controls.description: Protect organizational data

controls.name: Secure Configuration
controls.description: Establish and maintain secure configurations

controls.name: Account Management
controls.description: Manage the lifecycle of accounts

controls.name: Access Control Management
controls.description: Use MFA for all access

controls.name: Continuous Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Develop process to continuously assess and remediate

controls.name: Audit Log Management
controls.description: Collect, alert, review, and retain audit logs

controls.name: Email and Web Browser Protections
controls.description: Protect email and web browsing
controls.remediation: Implement email and web browser protections

controls.name: Malware Defenses
controls.description: Prevent or control malware

controls.name: Data Recovery
controls.description: Establish and maintain data recovery practices

controls.name: Network Infrastructure Management
controls.description: Establish and maintain secure network architecture

controls.name: Network Monitoring and Defense
controls.description: Monitor and defend the network

controls.name: Security Awareness Training
controls.description: Establish security awareness program

controls.name: Service Provider Management
controls.description: Manage security risks of service providers

controls.name: Application Software Security
controls.description: Secure application software

controls.name: Incident Response Management
controls.description: Establish incident response program

controls.name: Penetration Testing
controls.description: Conduct penetration tests

tactics.name: Initial Access
tactics.description: Trying to get into your network

tactics.name: Credential Access
tactics.description: Trying to steal account names and passwords

tactics.name: Discovery
tactics.description: Trying to figure out your environment

tactics.name: Lateral Movement
tactics.description: Trying to move through your environment

tactics.name: Collection
tactics.description: Trying to gather data of interest

tactics.name: Command and Control
tactics.description: Trying to communicate with compromised systems

tactics.name: Impact
tactics.description: Trying to manipulate, interrupt, or destroy systems and data

tactics.name: Resource Development
tactics.description: Trying to establish resources for operations

tactics.name: Reconnaissance
tactics.description: Trying to gather information for planning
